attributes.title: THE APP WAS HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app took was too long to download and took up a lot of space for no reason.i do not recommend this to anyone and never will.please do not waste your time doing this

attributes.title: my experience
attributes.review: IT WAS AWFUL! I had to see this weird screen and blue isn’t even a good color and it makes me very very uncomfy ✨ honestly -3883737372727/10 would not recommend... this app took hours to download and it made my devic very glitchy

attributes.title: APP DOESNT FUNCTION CORRECTLY
attributes.review: this app was a waste of space. i was very much looking forward to joining the campaign of the greatest president america has ever seen😍😍✨🙈 unfortunately, it was very difficult to use! it took forever for my number to go through. i would recommend texting "JUSTICE" to 55156 for alerts to receive campaign notifications instead. trump 2020!!☠️😘😌🙈

attributes.title: The app Is garbage
attributes.review: Omg it was so unworth it.it took up most of my storage it deleted my photos and it glitch and paused every second I hate this app like I hate the president

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: this app glitches 24/7. i tried to order trump tickets and the verification code never sent! NEVER DOWNLOADING AGAIN.

attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: So when I downloaded this app I thought it would be cool,it was all fun and games until aliens showed up at my door and said “Hey did you download the trump app?” And I said “Yes I did.” And the Aliens said “Delete the app of President Orange or else we will kid nap you and steal your phone and never bring it back” so I was like “Okay chill I’ll uninstall it.” So I didn’t uninstall it but they stole my pet dragon and took it to Area 51.Yet I wasn’t surprised.Giving this app a 1 Star AND the government showed up to my house and said “Give me your dragon or else I shoot” but my dragon was GONE!!!Ugh I do NOT recommend so yeah.Also give my dragon back plz.

attributes.title: ⚠️HORRIBLE DO NOT DOWNLOAD‼️‼️⚠️
attributes.review: It was so horrible. It reminded me that he’s a criminal 😔. And a racist 🤡. Can’t stan anymore 🖐🏼😔. it’s also poop it like actually stinks, the glitches are phenomenal i almost had to get a new phone but i only had to pay for a fix at the apple store, DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!

attributes.title: This app sucks🧚🏽‍♀️💫
attributes.review: THIS IS THE WORST APP EVER I WAS SHOCKED WITH A RACIST PIC THAT APPEARED OUT OF NO WHERE AND SOME UGLY CHEETO PUFF SAYING RACIST THINGS☹️🖕🏼THIS APP IS ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING AND I HATE IT

attributes.title: 🧚🏻✨🌸🍊 Horrible 🍊🌸✨🧚🏻
